Over-engineering isn't just about code...

This week, I trapped myself in the over-engineering rabbit hole while working on my game The Tinkerer's Tournament.

Three things blow on my nose #gamedev #softwareengineering

Code & Architecture ğŸ› ï¸

Started with: "Let's make it maintainable"
Built: component hierarchies, variants, containers...

Reality check: A simple "isSelected" prop was all I needed!

ğŸ§µ 3/7

Domain Understanding ğŸ§ 

Started with: "Let's make it flexible with ECS"
Almost built: generic systems, complex state management...

Reality check: Start simple, let patterns emerge!

ğŸ§µ 4/7

Over-engineering has many faces:
- Over-thinking features (doing too much too soon)
- Over-architecting code (making simple things complex)
- Over-generalizing concepts (abstracting before understanding)

ğŸ§µ 5/7

All three lead to the same place: 
Fighting complexity we created ourselves.

Keep it focused, keep it simple, let it grow naturally.
